detail_desc: Shirt in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a chest pocket and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Trousers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Knee-length skirt in soft, ribbed jersey with a high, elasticated waist. Unlined.
Metal chain belt with several strands at the front, a decorative pendant at one end and a fastening with a carabiner hook at the other. Length approx. 114cm.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, small embroidery detail on the chest and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Sleeveless dress in a cotton weave with frill trims on the shoulder straps and elastication at the back. Buttons down the front, a gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Long-sleeved cardigan in soft, textured-knit cotton with a round neckline, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Ankle-length trousers in stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and slim legs with side stripes.
Round sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Long shorts in washed, stretch twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, fake front pockets, real back pockets and raw-edge hems.
Chino shorts in a cotton weave with a zip fly and button, side pockets and welt back pockets with a button. Slim Fit that is close-fitting at the thighs to create a fitted silhouette.

Set with a vest-top in cotton jersey and pair of trousers in a viscose weave. Vest top with gathered frills over the shoulders and a print motif on the front. Trousers with an elasticated waist, side pockets and elasticated hems.
Velour top with an embroidered motif on the chest, kangaroo pocket, lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short, bell-shaped skirt in patterned satin with a high waist, pleats at the top, concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastening at the back, and pockets in the side seams. Unlined.
Long-sleeved cardigan in soft, textured-knit cotton with a round neckline, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Velour soft toy with embroidered details and a removable dress with a bow, glitter and hook and loop fastener. Polyester filling. Length approx. 22 cm.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Dress in patterned sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves, a gently rounded hem and a detachable, braided imitation leather belt. Unlined.

Long-sleeved shirt in washed Oxford cotton with a button-down collar, chest pocket and yoke with a hanger loop at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Water-repellent, softshell gloves with a soft fleece lining and reinforced palms in imitation leather. Elastication at the wrists, reflective details and a plastic hook-and-eye fastening to keep the gloves together. The tops of the thumb and index finger are made from touchscreen-compatible material.
Strapless, bandeau bras in jersey with mesh-lined cups and removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Side support and a wide elastic hem. No fasteners.
Shorts in printed cotton jersey with an elasticated, frill-trimmed waist with a decorative bow, and side pockets.
Biker jacket in felted fabric with notch lapels with decorative press-studs. Diagonal zip down the front, long sleeves and zipped side pockets. Lined.
Dress in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with long sleeves, a seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Long-sleeved, off-the-shoulder jersey top with a double frill in woven fabric and narrow elastication at the top.

Padded leather biker jacket with a diagonal zip down the front, lapels with press-studs and shoulder tabs. Zipped side and chest pockets, a small flap pocket with a press-stud and one inner pocket. Long sleeves with a zip at the cuffs and a sewn-in adjustable belt at the hem. Polyester filling. Lined.
Vest tops in soft organic cotton jersey.
Fitted, off-the-shoulder top in a fine-knit with long raglan sleeves.
Long-sleeved jacket dress in a crêpe weave with notch lapels and a wrapover front with a tie belt around the waist. Unlined.
Gloves in soft leather with a soft, fine-knit lining.
Short dress in ribbed jersey with 3/4-length sleeves, smooth jersey panels at the sides, a seam at the waist and a gently bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.
Leather mesh bag with a matching clutch bag. Two handles at the top and a flat base. Size approx. 32x50 cm.
Soft, non-wired lace bra with padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Cycling shorts in stretch nylon jersey with a sheen. High waist with covered elastication.
Joggers in soft stretch denim with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Pockets in the side seams, back pockets and seams at the knees.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a wrapover detail at the sides.
Gently flared, double-layered blouse in airy chiffon with a round, gathered neckline and double-layered flutter sleeves. Small opening and button at the back of the neck.
Shorts in cotton twill with a zip fly and button, front and back pockets and raw-edge frayed hems.
Braided straw hat with a grosgrain band. Width of brim 3.5 cm. Lined.
Boat-necked top in soft, ribbed cotton jersey with short raglan sleeves. Elasticated gathers at the sides for best fit over the tummy, and overlocked edges around the sleeves and hem.
Joggers in a linen weave with a regular, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a fake back pocket and tapered legs.

Set with a top and trousers in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric. Long-sleeved top with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Relaxed fit joggers with an easy pull-on elasticated, drawstring waist, low crotch and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Jumper in a soft cotton knit with long raglan sleeves, buttons on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in cotton jersey.
Short dress in washed, stretch denim with a collar, press-studs down the front and chest pockets. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt.
Fitted, lightweight outdoor jacket in fast-drying thermal fleece with a hood, zip down the front, zipped side pockets and extra long sleeves with thumbholes.
Jersey-lined joggers in soft washed denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket.
Jumper in fine-knit slub cotton with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Scarf in woven fabric with a lightly brushed finish. Fringes on the short sides.
Wide, ankle-length culottes in washed, stretch denim. Regular waist with covered elastication, a fake fly and press-stud, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Calf-length dress in ribbed jersey with a V-neck, narrow shoulder straps and buttons down the front. Unlined.
T-shirt in stretch jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with short, lace-trimmed sleeves.
Short, 5-pocket skirt in soft, washed cotton denim. High waist with a small frill trim, zip fly with two metal buttons at the top and a soft, detachable belt with metal D-rings.

Suit trousers in woven fabric with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button and legs with creases. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette. For the matching jacket, search on 0241602.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and a lined front.
Shirt in soft cotton twill with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Cold shoulder top in a soft viscose weave with narrow shoulder straps and an elasticated, lace-trimmed flounce at the shoulders.
Slim-leg treggings in patterned, stretch twill with a regular elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Slim-fit jeans in washed superstretch denim with hard-worn details, an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y) and zip fly and press-stud. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Baseball jacket in soft printed sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed stand-up collar, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.
V-neck top in viscose jersey with a lace yoke, 3/4-length sleeves and gathered side seams for best fit.
Twill cap with an appliqué on the front, a contrasting colour peak and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Metal hair grips. Length 5 cm.
Long-sleeved tops in stretch organic cotton jersey with a wide neckline and gathers at the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Fully lined V-neck swimsuit with narrow shoulder straps attached to a decorative metal ring at the back, low-cut back and high-cut legs.
Suede loafers with leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel approx. 1.5 cm.

Shirt designed to fit a small dog in a patterned cotton weave with a sheen. Collar, openings for the front legs and a hole for the lead at the back of the neck. Opening underneath with a smart hook and loop fastening that does not attach to fur.
Hooded poncho towel in soft cotton terry.
Fine-knit cotton jumper with long, rib-knit raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in soft, printed jersey made from a viscose blend with dropped shoulders and short, wide sleeves with smocking and a flounce.
Lightly padded jacket in woven fabric with a ribbed stand-up collar, a zip down the front with a chin guard and round pull, welt side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Hat in braided paper straw containing glittery threads decorated with pompoms and a thin cord with a bow. Frayed edge around the brim. Width of brim 3 cm.
Boys’ briefs in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined front.
Long-sleeved jumper in a fine knit with a V-neck, tie belt at the waist and slits in the sides.
Body in soft mesh and microfibre with a deep V-neck, wide shoulder straps that twist at the back and a lined gusset with press-studs.
Jersey joggers with an elasticated drawstring waist, low crotch and tapered legs.

Shirt in an airy weave made from a cotton blend with a turn-down collar and French front. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Long-sleeved dress in patterned cotton jersey with a seam at the waist and gently flared skirt.
Shorts in stretch twill with a zip fly and button, and front and back pockets.
Oversized jumper in a rib knit containing some wool with low dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
